hook.description: Woman in a car states "Three signs that you're destroying your phone!"

value_props.text: Free up phone storage by using Cleaner Guru to delete duplicate photos and merge contacts

storyboard.what_we_see: Woman in car states "Three signs that you're destroying your phone!"
storyboard.what_we_hear: Woman states "Three signs that you're destroying your phone!"

storyboard.what_we_see: Hands crossing out images of phone screens with red marker
storyboard.what_we_hear: Woman states "Number one is deleting photos manually. Number two is deleting all the apps on the phone. Number three is buying cloud storage."

storyboard.what_we_see: Hands crossing out images of phone screens with red marker. Then, hands navigating phone screen.
storyboard.what_we_hear: Woman states "These three mistakes can never free up your phone storage. Instead, use Cleaner Guru."
Woman states "Open this. Optimize your storage. Get rid of duplicate photos and videos. Merge duplicate contacts. Try it right now."

summary: The video is an advertisement for Cleaner Guru. The video shows three mistakes people make when trying to free up phone storage and then shows how Cleaner Guru can help.
